title: Gloorx Vloq
data:

|   |                                                |
| - | ---------------------------------------------- |
|   | A shadowy figure clothed in profound darkness. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Gloorx Vloq** is a [unique](/Unique "Unique") [Pandemonium lord](/Pandemonium_lord "Pandemonium lord"), a master of [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy") and guardian of the dark [rune](/Rune "Rune") of Zot. They are twice as fast as most characters, and often accompanied by [executioners](/Executioner "Executioner") and [curse skulls](/Curse_skull "Curse skull").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                          |                                                      |
| :---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Poison Arrow](/Poison_Arrow "Poison Arrow") (3d23)                      | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Miasma Breath](/Miasma_Breath "Miasma Breath") (3d13)                   | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Symbol of Torment](/Symbol_of_Torment "Symbol of Torment")              | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Dispel Undead Range](/Dispel_Undead_Range "Dispel Undead Range") (3d25) | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot5       | [Summon Executioners](/Summon_Executioners "Summon Executioners")        | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Gloorx may have less HP than some other Pan lords, but to many characters, is the most dangerous. They are twice as fast as the standard character, hits hard in melee, and and has an extraordinarily nasty spell set. [Haste](/Haste "Haste"), [poison](/Poison "Poison") resistance, and max [negative energy](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") resistance are strongly recommended. Be very careful, and have a means of escape ready.

  - [Lich Form](/Lich_Form "Lich Form") is helpful, if you can cast it, though lich characters should beware of Dispel Undead. A mass of [summons](/Summon "Summon") can help block Dispel Undead.
  - A [potion of lignification](/Potion_of_lignification "Potion of lignification") + [scroll of fog](/Scroll_of_fog "Scroll of fog") combination can work great, if you're careful. Tree Form confers immunity to torment, rPois, some natural AC, and it is immune to Dispel Undead. A scroll of fog creates fog clouds, preventing [miasma](/Miasma "Miasma") from being placed (clouds cannot replace existing clouds). All you'll have to worry about is the high damage in melee - and the squad of executioners.

- Gloorx resists [electricity](/Electricity "Electricity"), but has no resistance to [fire](/Fire "Fire") and only partial [cold](/Cold "Cold") resistance, so most elemental spells work well. Even Air Magic works - [Maxwell's Capacitive Coupling](/Maxwell%27s_Capacitive_Coupling "Maxwell's Capacitive Coupling") ignores resistances and [Chain Lightning](/Chain_Lightning "Chain Lightning") ignores half resistance.

- [Stabbers](/Stab "Stab") who manage to sneak up can usually kill in a single hit, but if that fails, its EV is low enough that [throwing nets](/Throwing_net "Throwing net") work very well.

## History

- In [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), Gloorx Vloq had the [Black Mark](/Black_Mark "Black Mark") spell.
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), Gloorx Vloq had [Bolt of Draining](/Bolt_of_Draining "Bolt of Draining") instead of its unique [Summon Executioners](/Summon_Executioners "Summon Executioners") spell.
- Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), Gloorx Vloq cast [Invisibility](/Invisibility "Invisibility") as an emergency spell.

A shadowy figure clothed in profound darkness.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Gloorx Vloq is a unique Pandemonium lord, a master of Necromancy and guardian of the dark rune of Zot. They are twice as fast as most characters, and often accompanied by executioners and curse skulls.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Poison Arrow (3d23) Magical flag
Slot2 Miasma Breath (3d13) Magical flag
Slot3 Symbol of Torment Magical flag
Slot4 Dispel Undead Range (3d25) Magical flag
Slot5 Summon Executioners Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Gloorx may have less HP than some other Pan lords, but to many characters, is the most dangerous. They are twice as fast as the standard character, hits hard in melee, and and has an extraordinarily nasty spell set. Haste, poison resistance, and max negative energy resistance are strongly recommended. Be very careful, and have a means of escape ready.
    • Lich Form is helpful, if you can cast it, though lich characters should beware of Dispel Undead. A mass of summons can help block Dispel Undead.
    • A potion of lignification + scroll of fog combination can work great, if you're careful. Tree Form confers immunity to torment, rPois, some natural AC, and it is immune to Dispel Undead. A scroll of fog creates fog clouds, preventing miasma from being placed (clouds cannot replace existing clouds). All you'll have to worry about is the high damage in melee - and the squad of executioners.
  • Gloorx resists electricity, but has no resistance to fire and only partial cold resistance, so most elemental spells work well. Even Air Magic works - Maxwell's Capacitive Coupling ignores resistances and Chain Lightning ignores half resistance.
  • Stabbers who manage to sneak up can usually kill in a single hit, but if that fails, its EV is low enough that throwing nets work very well.

History

  • In 0.18, Gloorx Vloq had the Black Mark spell.
  • Prior to 0.18, Gloorx Vloq had Bolt of Draining instead of its unique Summon Executioners spell.
  • Prior to 0.13, Gloorx Vloq cast Invisibility as an emergency spell.

{{version030}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Gloorx Vloq''' is a [[unique]] [[Pandemonium lord]], a master of [[Necromancy]] and guardian of the dark [[rune]] of Zot. They are twice as fast as most characters, and often accompanied by [[executioner]]s and [[curse skull]]s.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Gloorx may have less HP than some other Pan lords, but to many characters, is the most dangerous. They are twice as fast as the standard character, hits hard in melee, and and has an extraordinarily nasty spell set. [[Haste]], [[poison]] resistance, and max [[negative energy]] resistance are strongly recommended. Be very careful, and have a means of escape ready.
** [[Lich Form]] is helpful, if you can cast it, though lich characters should beware of Dispel Undead. A mass of [[summon]]s can help block Dispel Undead.
** A [[potion of lignification]] + [[scroll of fog]] combination can work great, if you're careful. Tree Form confers immunity to torment, rPois, some natural AC, and it is immune to Dispel Undead. A scroll of fog creates fog clouds, preventing [[miasma]] from being placed (clouds cannot replace existing clouds). All you'll have to worry about is the high damage in melee - and the squad of executioners.
*Gloorx resists [[electricity]], but has no resistance to [[fire]] and only partial [[cold]] resistance, so most elemental spells work well. Even Air Magic works - [[Maxwell's Capacitive Coupling]] ignores resistances and [[Chain Lightning]] ignores half resistance.
*[[Stab]]bers who manage to sneak up can usually kill in a single hit, but if that fails, its EV is low enough that [[throwing net]]s work very well.

==History==
*In [[0.18]], Gloorx Vloq had the [[Black Mark]] spell.
*Prior to [[0.18]], Gloorx Vloq had [[Bolt of Draining]] instead of its unique [[Summon Executioners]] spell. 
*Prior to [[0.13]], Gloorx Vloq cast [[Invisibility]] as an emergency spell.
